replies.body: Azir doesn't need anything the meta doesn't fit him sadly :( I play him too. idk about nunu tho

Blood boil still gives attack speed but also amplifies AP rather like deathcap.

It would also be nice for kog, of course.
This a PBE thing or simply something you are suggesting?
Sounds fun.  It would be nice to get a few supports that can amp up AP characters for bot.
